items.sentence: Tom certainly works as hard as anyone else on his team.
Tom and Mary wouldn\'t tell me what they planned to do.
Tom has already done everything we\'ve asked him to do.
No matter how hard she tried, she couldn\'t please him.
No matter what I try, I can\'t seem to give up smoking.
Tom kept on talking even though Mary had fallen asleep.
Tom poured Mary a cup of coffee and topped off his own.
Tom was afraid that no one would show up for the party.
I\'ve got a hunch something might be happening tonight.
Tom\'s father is taking Tom and me skiing next weekend.
